Package: com.jcatalog.grailsflow.messagebundle

[Java] Class DefaultMessageBundleProvider

    • com.jcatalog.grailsflow.messagebundle.DefaultMessageBundleProvider
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      MessageBundleProvider

      public class DefaultMessageBundleProvider

      It is default implementation of MessageBundleProvider. It uses I18nMessageBundleProvider for loading message bundle by its name. Also it uses Spring LocaleContextHolder for getting current Locale - it is used for creating instance of MessageBundle.

      Authors:
      Roman Denisyuk
      See Also:
      I18nMessageBundleProvider
      DefaultMessageBundle
